#include<iostream>
#include<cstdio>
#include<vector>
#include<cstring>
#include<algorithm>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    int temp,carry,i,n,j;
    scanf("%d",&n);
    if(n==0)
        printf("1");
    else if(n<3)
    {
        printf("%d",2*n);
    }
    else
    {
        vector<int> v;
        v.push_back(1);
        for(i=1;i<=n;i++)
        {
            carry=0;
            for(j=0;j<v.size();j++)
            {
                temp=(v[j]*2+carry);
                carry=temp/10;
                //printf("%d\n",carry);
                v[j]=temp%10;
            }
            while(carry)
            {
                v.push_back(carry%10);
                carry=carry/10;
            }

            //printf("\n");
        }
        for(j=v.size()-1;j>=0;j--)
            {
                printf("%d",v[j]);
            }
    }
    return 0;
}
